name: Raw Peanuts
description: Peanuts are as popular as they are healthy. They’re an excellent plant-based source of protein and high in various vitamins, minerals, and plant compounds. They can be useful as a part of a weight loss diet and may reduce your risk of both heart disease and gallstones. However, being high in fat, this legume is a high-calorie food and should not be eaten in excess. Disclaimer: Please note that the image is used for presentation purposes only. Actual product may slightly defer. Our team at Cargills Online takes every step to ensure to maintain the accuracy of all information displayed. *Images for illustration purposes only.
